vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.24;
son of: Korah (H7141I);
brother of: Assir (H0617) and Ebiasaph (H0043)
§ Elkanah = "God has possessed" or "God has created"
1) Samuel's father
2) a ruler in Jerusalem in the time of king Ahaz
3) one of David's mighty warriors
4) son of Korah
5) several Levites
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Asir; descendiente de Quehat; tribu de Leví; (b)   hijo de Jeroham; padre de Samuel; ancestro de Hemán; (c)   guerrero; en tiempos del rey David; (d)   hombre; tribu de Leví; (e)   hijo de Ahimot, Máhat; ancestro de Samuel, Hemán; tribu de Leví; (f)   hijo de Joel; ancestro de Hemán; tribu de Leví; (g)   ancestro de Berequías, levita; (h)   portador del arca; tribu de Leví; en tiempos del rey David; (i)   segundo al mando del rey Ahaz
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利加拿 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "上帝所擁有" 或 "上帝創造的"
1) 撒母耳的父親
2) 亞哈斯年間一個耶路撒冷的統治者 #代下 28:7|
3) 大衛王大能勇士之一 #代上 12:6|
4) 可拉的兒子 #出 6:24|
5) 數名利未人
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以利加拿 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "上帝所拥有" 或 "上帝创造的"
1) 撒母耳的父亲
2) 亚哈斯年间一个耶路撒冷的统治者 #代下 28:7|
3) 大卫王大能勇士之一 #代上 12:6|
4) 可拉的儿子 #出 6:24|
5) 数名利未人

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.1.1;
son of: Jeroham (H3395); married to Hannah (H2584) and Peninnah (H6444);
father of: Samuel (H8050)
§ Elkanah = "God has possessed" or "God has created"
1) Samuel's father
2) a ruler in Jerusalem in the time of king Ahaz
3) one of David's mighty warriors
4) son of Korah
5) several Levites

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.25;
son of: Shaul (H7586J);
father of: Amasai (H6022)
§ Elkanah = "God has possessed" or "God has created"
1) Samuel's father
2) a ruler in Jerusalem in the time of king Ahaz
3) one of David's mighty warriors
4) son of Korah
5) several Levites
